author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
To Clutch a Razor is Veronica Roth’s second entry in the Curse Bearer series and picks up not long after the end of When Among Crows. There might be some spoilers for the first book in this review, so proceed with caution if you have yet to finish book one. Dymitr has been separated from […]

The post REVIEW: To Clutch a Razor by Veronica Roth appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: To Clutch a Razor by Veronica Roth
